hero.heading: Turn raw web leads into prioritized sales opportunities
hero.description: Our Lead Enrichment & Scoring Bot enriches every form submission with firmographics, scores them with AI, and pushes ready-to-work leads straight into your CRM.

steps.title: Enrich & score

callToAction.title: Ready to supercharge your pipeline?

testimonials.description: Loved by sales teams at high-growth companies:

Setting up the enrichment bot took less than 5 minutes. Now our reps focus only on the hottest opportunities.
The combination of firmographics and AI scoring has transformed how we prioritize outreach.
